TopicTitle: Need Help (Likely spoilers for Other Worlds story mod)

Articles.Content:
Link to OG post

 

Found and experimented with the Secrets Website for Niako's Other Worlds mod. Used Inspect and found several messages with actual "answers", listed below:

Spoiler

Secunda/Prima:

Secret!

What, you expected something interesting?

 

Vassa:

If I had to choose the planet opposite to 'The Last One'

...I would totally pick this one

 

Troni/Pequar/Nienna:

Good guess but...

Do you think Troni/Pequar/Nienna sounds like 'The Last Planet'?

 

Disole/Crons/Kevari:

But but...

That's not even a planet! It's a moon!

...still a planet in my heart

 

C2-1/C3-1/C4-1/C4-2:

Scrapping the bottom of the barrel?

No worries, I would have typed the same

 

The last planet/Last planet:

I'm going to throw you to the lava pits of Troni

 

Earth:

Found the RSS player!

 

Kerbin:

Look, I don't want to be the bearer of bad news...

...but that's kinda where you start

 

Cercani:

Hold up...

...THAT'S A PLANET!?

After this I found an encrypted message in (possibly?) UTF-8, with it also likely being Base64 although I am not sure what it is truely. The message is:

Spoiler

U2FsdGVkX18yVJg4W2mElwt5dG/f9bnCY4iHkCuRPPjZESmnM97rJkHSEFrSNQsWSP2DI9qaG480DOhSJnNSTg==

When putting it through decoding websites the most legible is Base64 on UTF-8, with it being:

Spoiler

Salted__2T8[i ytoc+<)3&AZ5 H#ښ4 R&sRN on https://www.base64decode.org/ or Salted__2T�8[i�� yto����c���+�<��)�3��&A�Z�5 H��#ښ�4 �R&sRN on http://dencode.com

Thank you and please help me with this.
